entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
